stormtrooper_commander.name: Stormtrooper Commander
stormtrooper_commander.description: A commander under the command of the Agencies.

armored_stormtrooper_truck.name: Armored Stormtrooper Truck
armored_stormtrooper_truck.description: An armored transport of the imperial defense force.

officer.name: Officer
officer.description: A zealous lawman who is specialized in hunting down a certain enemy.

storm_troopers.name: Storm Troopers
storm_troopers.description: A team of operatives tasked with hunting and destroying the enemy.

dog_handler.name: K9 Unit
dog_handler.description: An operative tasked with handling a pack of attack dogs.

agents.name: Agents
agents.description: Lightly-equipped operatives tasked with skirmishing and securing objectives.

riot_troopers.name: Riot Troopers
riot_troopers.description: A team of operatives armed with mauls and shields to fend off mobs.

psyker_hunter_assassin.name: Psychic-Hunter Assassin
psyker_hunter_assassin.description: An assassin trained in hunting down rogue psychics.

sniper_assassin.name: Sniper Assassin
sniper_assassin.description: An assassin trained in hunting down and removing dangerous leaders.

berserker_assassin.name: Berzerker Assassin
berserker_assassin.description: An assassin trained in brutal close combat.

stealth_assassin.name: Stealth Assassin
stealth_assassin.description: An assassin sent to strike from the shadows.

agency_light_gunship.name: Agency Light Gunship
agency_light_gunship.description: A light gunship with sliding doors for troop transport.

marine_apc.name: APC
marine_apc.description: A durable transport built by the imperial marines.

repression_apc.name: Repression APC
repression_apc.description: A heavy transport with firing slits.

marine_heavy_tank.name: Heavy Assault APC
marine_heavy_tank.description: A heavily armored transport sporting an arsenal of weapons built by the imperial marines.

riders.name: Rider Squad
riders.description: A team of operatives mounted on either horseback or motorcycle for more mobility.

witch_hunters_champion.name: Witch Hunter Champion
witch_hunters_champion.description: A Witch Hunter leader adept at leading witch hunters into battle.

guardian_captain_on_jetbike.name: Guardian Captain on Jetbike
guardian_captain_on_jetbike.description: Throne guardians on high speed jet bikes.

guardian_blademaster.name: Guardian Blademaster
guardian_blademaster.description: A Throne Guardian who foreswore ranged weapons in favor of mastering the blade.

witch_hunters.name: Witch Hunters
witch_hunters.description: A group of Witch hunters adept at hunting Psychic individuals.

throne_ancient.name: Guardian Ancient
throne_ancient.description: A banner carrier for the Throne Guardians.

throne_ancient_destroyer.name: Guardian Ancient in Destroyer Armor
throne_ancient_destroyer.description: A banner carrier for the Throne Guardians in heavy armor.

throne_wardens.name: Wardens
throne_wardens.description: Watch masters and veteran throne guardians.

throne_jetbikes.name: Jetbikes
throne_jetbikes.description: Throne guardians on high speed jet bikes.

guardian_destoyers.name: Guardian Destroyers
guardian_destoyers.description: Guardians clad in very heavy armor.

guardian_heavy_tank.name: Relic Heavy Assault APC
guardian_heavy_tank.description: A heavily armored transport sporting an arsenal of weapons built by the imperial marines.

light_attack_vehicle.name: Light Hover Tank
light_attack_vehicle.description: A light attack vehicle with medium tank killing capability.

hover_tank.name: Hover Tank
hover_tank.description: A hover tank with good tank killing capability.

hover_transport.name: Hover Transport
hover_transport.description: A hover transport with decent supporting weaponry.

combat_walker.name: Guardian Combat Juggernaut
combat_walker.description: An agile walker with melee weapons.

interrogate.name: Interrogation
interrogate.description: Target enemy unit within 12" must re-roll one die of your choice on its next Skill test.

banishment.name: Banishment
banishment.description: Target enemy model within 12" takes 1 automatic hit with AP(7).

purge.name: Purge
purge.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 8 automatic hits with AP 0.

berzerk_overload.name: Berzerk Overload
berzerk_overload.description: When this unit is destroyed, all units within 6" gain 2 shock.

phase.name: Phase
phase.description: Units with the Resilient and Tough rules cannot use them for saves against this weapon's attacks.

legend_witch_hunter.name: Psychic Feedback
legend_witch_hunter.description: Once per turn, when a power within 24" of this model gets dispelled, deal 1 hit with AP(2) to the caster.

legend_alien_hunter.name: Breacher Weapons
legend_alien_hunter.description: Once per turn, a unit with the Resilient and Tough rules cannot use them for saves against this unit's attack.

legend_mutant_hunter.name: Blacksite Warden
legend_mutant_hunter.description: When this model's unit successfully performs a reaction against a Charge action, the charging unit suffers 6 hits with no AP.

banner_of_blindness.name: Banner of Blindness
banner_of_blindness.description: Once per round a when a friendly Infantry unit is targeted by a shooting attack, the attacker suffers -1 Accuracy.

battle_tactics.name: Battle Tactics
battle_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ and failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

battle_tactics_biker.name: Biker Battle Tactics
battle_tactics_biker.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ or _Biker_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ and failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

witch_hunter_tactics.name: Witch Hunter Tactics
witch_hunter_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Witch Hunters Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ 
 * Re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+

legend_ever_vigilant.name: Ever-Vigilant
legend_ever_vigilant.description: If this unit did not take a Move or _Charge_ action in its previous activation, it gains +2 to its Save

legend_peerless_warrior.name: Peerless Warrior
legend_peerless_warrior.description: Once per turn, this unit may take the Counter-Attack reaction without losing the ability to activate later in the turn.

strategies.name: Vigilance
strategies.description: Use when taking an Initiative test for a reaction. That unit is treated as having +2 Initiative for that test.
strategies.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these soldiers are trained to react to any situation.

strategies.name: Reality Stabilizers
strategies.description: Use when a Power(x) test is taken within 24" of an Infantry unit. Roll a D10. If the value is less than or equal to the test to cast the power, it is prevented.
strategies.flavor: Advanced technology prevents the use of reality-warping psychic powers, leaving the Agencies' foes helpless.

strategies.name: Teleporter
strategies.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in _Ambush Reserves_ instead of deployed on the field.
strategies.flavor: The Inquisition often arrives via a teleporter to surprise their enemies.

legend_witch_hunter.name: Psychic Feedback
legend_witch_hunter.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Psychic Feedback.
legend_witch_hunter.flavor: Whether with powerful warding tech or their own psychic skill, this officer can deliver a mental counter-blow to a target.

legend_alien_hunter.name: Breacher Weapons
legend_alien_hunter.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Breacher Weapons.
legend_alien_hunter.flavor: This officer's experimental tech allows them to bypass even the most advanced or paranormal of defences.

legend_mutant_hunter.name: Blacksite Warden
legend_mutant_hunter.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Blacksite Warden.
legend_mutant_hunter.flavor: Countless years defending Agency blacksites from internal and external threats has given this officer great skill in repelling ambushes.
